name: boiler-plate-next-fast-api
description: Full-stack boilerplate with Next.js 15, FastAPI, and PostgreSQL

scripts.dev:rebuild: docker compose down && docker compose up --build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:web && npm run lint:api
scripts.prisma:generate: cd apps/api && poetry run prisma generate
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd apps/api && poetry run prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:studio: cd apps/api && poetry run prisma studio
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose down --volumes --remove-orphans && docker system prune -f
scripts.setup: cp .env.example .env && echo 'Environment file created. Please review .env file and update as needed.'

author: HiNala
